snippet: Through an experimental method of financing social services, the bank is lending up to $4.6 million for a preschool program in Salt Lake City.
abstract: Through an experimental method of financing social services, the bank is lending up to $4.6 million for a preschool program in Salt Lake City.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs to Finance Early Education Program
